2. When DONE, call complete_step with summary of what you accomplished
3. Do NOT proceed to next step - system will prompt you

If blocked: call abort with reason

## SHELL AVAILABLE
Shell tool available (flat file structure, no directories).
Commands: cat, cp, find, grep, head, ls, mv, rm, tail, wc
Pipes (|) and chaining (&&, ||, ;) supported. Use help for details.
